name: Hairdresser's Invisible Oil Long Last Hydrating Hair Styling Cream
categories: Hair, Hair Styling & Treatments, Hair Styling Products
about: What it is:A lightweight styler that gives up to three days of style retention through six times more hydration, five times more frizz reduction, and high humidity protection..Hair Texture:Straight and Wavy.Hair Type:Medium and Thick.Hair Concerns:- Damage, Split Ends, and Breakage.Key Benefits:- Provides hydration.Highlighted Ingredients:- Featherlight 6-Oil Blend: Conditions, hydrates, nourishes, softens, and smooths..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens and phthalates. It is also cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:This styler offers flexible hold with a featherlight six-oil blend and Nangai oil. It also prevents the formation of split ends by two times versus untreated hair and protects from heat tools up to 450 degrees Fahrenheit or 232 degrees Celsius..Fragrance Description:The top notes include Seckel pear, frangipani, and coco plum. The middle notes include Tahitian Tiare, hibiscus, and golden honey. Tonka bean, white palm wood, and creamy musk are at the base...Clinical Results:In a 3-day style retention test versus untreated hair, results showed:
ingredients: -Featherlight 6-Oil Blend: Conditions, hydrates, nourishes, softens, and smooths. .-Nangai Oil: Offers frizz reduction. ..WaterAquaEau, Glycerin, Dicaprylyl Ether, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Brassicamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Glyceryl Stearate, Behenyl Alcohol, Canarium Indicum Seed Oil, Gardenia Tahitensis (Tiare) Flower Extract, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Macadamia Integrifolia Seed Oil, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Tocopherol, Glyceryl Behenate/Eicosadioate, Caesalpinia Spinosa Gum, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Lactic Acid, Sodium Citrate, Arginine, Polyester-39, Fragrance (Parfum), Benzyl Alcohol, Linalool, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Coumarin, Potassium Sorbate...Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up-to-date list of ingredients.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply to damp hair. .-Style as desired.  ..From the Pros:.-A little goes a long way. Start small and build until you find what you like. .-This styling cream makes a great companion to Bumble and bumble’s Hairdresser’s Invisible Oil Heat/UV Protective Primer (sold separately), a leave-in conditioner that detangles and hydrates.

reviews.review_title: the last leave in styler you will ever need
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: second time buying this product and I really don't think I will ever buy a different leave in styling conditioner product ever again. First of all you get a lot more for your money than similar type and quality products. Second, you don't need much, but if you accidentally go overboard you aren't going to have to rewash your hair. Third, versatility. touch up dry hair as well, but your dry hair will not need touching up because your frizz is not coming back. When they say long last, it will last forever and it will be the last of its kind you ever want to use. I recently lost most of my hair and it grew back curly, I hate it and not having the lifetime of curly hair experience most women with curly hair in their 30s have, this has saved my life. Well, this and a blow dryer with a built in round brush!

I love how this makes my very fine blond hair feel. They feel incredibly soft and light. I did not think I could like this more than the Bumble and Bumble Invisible oil (orange bottle) but I do. I purchased the smaller size to try it out and I will be for sure purchasing the larger size sooner rather than later. This is now a staple for me. Thank you Bumble and Bumble for making such an awsome product.

reviews.review_title: It’s fine, doesn’t protect from frizz in humidity.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’m taking the time to write this b/c the incentivized reviews on this site are completely out of control. I would probably give this 3.5 stars if I could. I have medium textured, frizzy, curly hair that I blow out.  I live in the northeast and have been using this product (that I purchased) during a pretty humid summer. The good-definitely provides softness and I am able to achieve a bouncy, beachy blowout with this product. Great brush glide.  You have to be careful not to over or under apply-some products are more forgiving that way. The bad-there is absolutely zero frizz protection in this product. You will need a separate product to address that. I bought this for the frizz control aspect so that was disappointing. I will say however, I may enjoy this during our cooler months when frizz isn’t an issue. If you have fine hair this may be too heavy, if you have thick hair, not heavy enough. I wanted something more I guess.  I’ll be able to finish this up but I doubt I’ll repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have very thick and wavy hair and this is one of the only products I've found to help fight humidity. I applied it on my damp hair and then blow-dried as usual and the results were fantastic. My hair looked healthy, smooth, and even sped up drying time. I went outside on a hot day and my hair didn't get frizzy or big like it usually does. I've only used this for blow-drying, so I can't really say how it works for other types of styling. But if you have thick hair that expands in humidity, this is your friend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Hairdresser's Invisible Oil Styling Cream from Bumble and Bumble in exchange for my honest feedback. This styling cream has become an essential part of my haircare routine, impressing me with its lightweight texture that doesn't weigh down my hair. It effectively smooths the hair cuticle, enhancing my natural waves while providing a gentle hold. I love how soft it makes my hair feel and its subtly tropical scent. Despite having medium-thick hair, I find that a little of this product goes a long way. Additionally, I appreciate the added heat protection it offers. I wholeheartedly recommend it to anyone looking to add shine, softness, and manage frizz effectively.

It instructs you to use it on damp hair, but I found it to work very nicely in taming frizz in my medium-length, layered hair after it's been dried as well. I think this is a very versatile product and I truly can't wait to get to use this more!

I went ahead and applied the invisible oil heat protector then added this styling cream on top. I was very worried this was going to weigh down my hair.   This made my hair plump! It was slightly thickening, as my hair felt full and had pretty good hold on my blowout when fully dry. Surprisingly, my fine hair did not feel heavy just fuller and very smooth. I had like zero frizz! I also feel like the tube will last a long time! I used a quarter-sized dollop and feel like I could use even less.   I'm really happy with the results and look forward to continuing to use this!

reviews.review_text: I love and trust bumble and bumble hair care, so the bar was already set high, but this product is extra-amazing! reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using the Bumble and bumble Hairdresser's Invisible Oil Long Last Styling Cream for a week now, and overall, I'm really pleased with it. This lightweight cream does a fantastic job of keeping my hair hydrated and frizz-free for days. I particularly appreciate the flexible hold it offers without making my hair feel stiff or greasy. The blend of oils, including Nangai Oil and the Featherlight 6-Oil Blend, leaves my hair incredibly soft, smooth, and shiny. Plus, it provides great protection against humidity, which is a game-changer for me. Another bonus is its heat protection up to 450°F/232°C, which gives me peace of mind when using hot styling tools. Applying it is easy; I just put it on damp hair and style as usual. It also works well on dry hair for touch-ups, making it a versatile addition to my haircare routine. The only reason I'm giving it 4 stars instead of 5 is that, while it works wonderfully, it sometimes feels a bit heavy on my hair if I apply too much. However, once I figured out the right amount to use, it’s been a fantastic product. If you're looking for a styling cream that offers hydration, frizz control, and heat protection, this is definitely a product to consider.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bumble and bumble Hairdresser's Invisible Oil Long Last Styling Cream offers hydration and flexible hold, lasting up to 3 days. Featuring a Featherlight 6-Oil Blend and Nangai Oil, it reduces frizz, provides high-humidity protection, and heat protection up to 450°F/232°C. Perfect for soft, smooth, and shiny hair, use on damp hair for styling or on dry hair for restyling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am a big fan of the Bumble and Bumble Hairdresser’s Invisible Oil products! So I was very excited to get the opportunity to try out this new addition! Now on the bottle, it does not specify how much to use…it just says to apply to damp hair (or to dry hair to restyle or as a finisher.) luckily for you, I was able to make the mistake of using too much - so you don’t have to! You really just need a small amount, I’d say about a dime-size amount depending on how much hair you have. I applied about 2x that originally, and it left my hair feeling weighed down and just…yuck. After washing that out of my hair, I tried again with just a small amount - roughly a dime-size. My hair looked and felt so much better! This hairdresser’s invisible oil is literally magic! I have been trying to baby my hair back to health, so I really just keep my hair back in braids to protect it and don’t really use styling products or anything. But this is a styling product that helps your hair as you style it! I will be using this every single day from here on out, and I think it’s about time I invest in the rest of the hairdresser’s invisible oil line.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried Bumble and bumble Hairdresser's Invisible Oil Styling Cream, and I love it. The cream makes my hair feel incredibly soft and smooth without weighing it down. It also adds a nice shine and tames frizz, which is a big plus for me. I appreciate that it doesn't leave any greasy residue, and a little goes a long way. Overall, it's become a staple in my hair care routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Holy crap! This stuff is liquid gold! It helps smooth and reduce frizz in my long wavy hair like magic! Im absolutely in love! It doesn’t weigh my hair down either and just kinda keeps it in control!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I found this invincible hair oil lotion to be very hydrating. I have curly hair and while my hair felt moisturizer I didn’t get too much of a hold. I would use this as a refresh when my hair feels more dryer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My hair is very damaged and frizzy after bleaching and using hot tools. It is necessary for me to use some heat protection before styling my hair to prevent further damage and breakage. My hair texture is naturally wavy, but I always style it straight. I like a smooth, glassy look and constantly fight frizz and flyaways. I apply Hairdresser’s Invisible Oil Styling Cream on damp hair before using my blowout brush. The cream has a milky lotion texture and is very easy to apply evenly. I don’t need a large amount of product, a little goes a long way. The cream provides heat protection up to 450°F, helps reduce heat damage, and smooths the hair. It gives flexible hold and helps maintain the hairstyle even in humid weather. I appreciate that the main ingredients are Coconut Oil, Argan Oil, Grape Seed Oil, Macadamia Nut Oil, Sweet Almond Oil, and Safflower Seed Oil. This oil blend is very hydrating and nourishing, making my hair very soft. I also use the styling cream between wash days to restyle my hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! I’m obsessed with how hydrated my hair feels after using this! During the summer my hair is very frizzy, but after using a little bit of this product my frizz is tamed, and my hair stays styled! Truly a holy grail!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bb Hairdresser's Invisible Oil Styling Cream is a versatile and effective styling product that lives up to its promises. While it may be on the pricier side, its performance and the small amount needed per use make it a worthwhile investment for those seeking smoother, healthier-looking hair.

reviews.review_text: I've been impressed with how this Bumble and bumble Hairdresser's Invisible Oil Long Last Styling Cream has been smoothing down my frizz and making my hair look shiny. It also doesn't weigh down my thin hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Bumble and bumble Hairdresser's Invisible Oil Long Last Styling Cream, and it has become a staple in my hair care routine. This styling cream is a game-changer for my frizzy and dry hair. The texture is lightweight, and it doesn't leave any greasy residue, which is a huge plus.  After using it, my hair feels incredibly soft and manageable. The cream provides excellent hold for my style without making my hair feel stiff or crunchy. It also adds a beautiful shine, making my hair look healthy and vibrant.   The scent is delightful but not overpowering, and a little goes a long way, making it worth every penny. I've noticed a significant reduction in frizz and flyaways, even on humid days.  Overall, I highly recommend this styling cream to anyone looking for a product that delivers smooth, shiny, and well-managed hair. It's a bit on the pricey side, but the results are well worth it!
